show-input.description: Whether or not to display the input box is only valid when the range is not selected
show-input.description_zh: 是否显示输入框，仅在非范围选择时有效

show-input-controls.description: In the case of an input box, whether to display the control buttons of the input box
show-input-controls.description_zh: 在显示输入框的情况下，是否显示输入框的控制按钮

input-size.description: Enter the dimensions of the box

show-stops.description: Whether to display a break point

range.description: Whether or not to select a scope

vertical.description: Whether or not to be in portrait mode

height.description: Slider height, required in portrait mode
height.description_zh: Slider 高度，竖向模式时必填

:debounce.description: The debounce delay on input, in milliseconds, is only valid when 'show-input' is equal to true
:debounce.description_zh: 输入时的去抖延迟，毫秒，仅在`show-input`等于true时有效

:marks.description: tags, the type of key must be number and the value must be in the closed interval '[min, max]', and each token can be styled separately
:marks.description_zh: 标记， key 的类型必须为 number 且取值在闭区间 `[min, max]` 内，每个标记可以单独设置样式

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers when the value changes (when dragging with the mouse, it only triggers when the mouse is released)
events.description_zh: 值改变时触发（使用鼠标拖曳时，只在松开鼠标后触发）

events.name: input
events.description: Triggered when data changes (when dragging with the mouse, the activity process is triggered in real time)
events.description_zh: 数据改变时触发（使用鼠标拖曳时，活动过程实时触发）
